Despite call public health organization expert field universal access preconception care , US woman receive health counseling prepare pregnancy . Given approximately half US pregnancy unintended , critical routine primary care serve venue provision important service . Several preconception health promotion tool develop patient date ; truly patient-centered even few rigorously evaluate . This study present MyFamilyPlan - novel , web-based , patient center preconception health education tool design woman reproductive age receive primary care . MyFamilyPlan truly innovative two key way : - MyFamilyPlan web-based preconception health self-assessment . This allow employment skip logic individualize questionnaire subsequent health recommendation patient . - Recognizing preconception care relevant woman `` risk '' pregnancy , MyFamilyPlan design utilization primary care set . This preconception health education tool test use randomize controlled design . It also evaluate whether intervention affect participant self-efficacy planning healthy pregnancy , relevant health behavior ( secondary outcome ) . The study propose improve quality evidence preconception health education tool . Should demonstrate effectiveness , also result new tool could make widely available promote preconception health .
